tool_description: With this API, users can tap data into real-time data from Booking.com, allowing them to access information on hotel rooms, prices, amenities, and policies from a vast selection of hotels worldwide.
name: Booking  Data
title: Booking  Data

api_list.name: properties/detail/facilities

required_parameters.name: detail_id
required_parameters.description: The value of the detail_id field is obtained from the **`detailId`** field in the `stays/auto-complete` API.

api_list.name: properties/list

required_parameters.name: location
required_parameters.description: The value of the **location** field is retrieved from the 【stays/auto-complete API】.

optional_parameters.name: room_accessibility
optional_parameters.description:
Room Accessibility
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: accessible_room_facilities::131,  accessible_room_facilities::132

`accessible_room_facilities::131`  :  Entire unit located on ground floor
`accessible_room_facilities::132`  :  Upper floors accessible by elevator
`accessible_room_facilities::134`  :  Entire unit wheelchair accessible
`accessible_room_facilities::147`  :  Toilet with grab rails
`accessible_room_facilities::148`  :  Adapted bath
`accessible_room_facilities::149`  :  Roll-in shower
`accessible_room_facilities::150`  :  Walk-in shower
`accessible_room_facilities::151`  :  Raised toilet
`accessible_room_facilities::152`  :  Lower sink
`accessible_room_facilities::153`  :  Emergency cord in bathroom
`accessible_room_facilities::154`  :  Shower chair

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **room_accessibility** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Room Accessibility'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: property_accessibility
optional_parameters.description:
Property Accessibility
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: accessible_facilities::185,  accessible_facilities::186

`accessible_facilities::185`  :  Wheelchair accessible
`accessible_facilities::186`  :  Toilet with grab rails
`accessible_facilities::187`  :  Raised toilet
`accessible_facilities::188`  :  Lowered sink
`accessible_facilities::189`  :  Bathroom emergency cord
`accessible_facilities::211`  :  Visual aids (Braille)
`accessible_facilities::212`  :  Visual aids (tactile signs)
`accessible_facilities::213`  :  Auditory guidance

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **property_accessibility** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Property Accessibility'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: facilities
optional_parameters.description:
Facilities
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: hotelfacility::107,  hotelfacility::16

`hotelfacility::107`  :  Free WiFi
`hotelfacility::16`     :  Non-smoking rooms
`hotelfacility::2`        :  Parking
`hotelfacility::28`     :  Family rooms
`hotelfacility::4`        :  Pet friendly
`hotelfacility::8`        :  24-hour front desk
`hotelfacility::25`     :  Facilities for disabled guests
`hotelfacility::3`        :  Restaurant
`hotelfacility::11`     :  Fitness center
`hotelfacility::5`        : Room service
`hotelfacility::182`  :  Electric vehicle charging station
`hotelfacility::17`     :  Airport shuttle
`hotelfacility::54`     :  Spa
`hotelfacility::433`  :  Swimming pool

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **facilities** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Facilities'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: brands
optional_parameters.description:
Brands
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: chaincode::13837,  chaincode::13777

`chaincode::13837`  :  limehome
`chaincode::13777`  :  numa
`chaincode::1053`  :  ibis
`chaincode::10822`  :  Novum Select Hotels
`chaincode::1844`  :  Leonardo Hotels
`chaincode::2305`  :  Select Hotels
`chaincode::10820`  :  Novum Hotels
`chaincode::1050`  :  Novotel
`chaincode::1051`  :  Mercure
`chaincode::1072`  :  Holiday Inn Hotels & Resorts
`chaincode::1641`  :  Design Hotels
`chaincode::13371`  :  Good Morning Hotels by Ligula
`chaincode::14579`  :  Acora
`chaincode::1029`  :  Best Western
`chaincode::1040`  :  Park Plaza Hotels & Resorts
`chaincode::1052`  :  Novotel Suites
`chaincode::1226` :  H-Hotels.com
`chaincode::1231`  :  Maritim
`chaincode::1348`  :  Pestana Hotel & Resorts
`chaincode::1490`  :  Steigenberger Hotels & Resorts

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **brands** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Brands'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: room_facilities
optional_parameters.description:
Room Facilities
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: roomfacility::14,  roomfacility::24

`roomfacility::14`  :  Hot tub
`roomfacility::24`  :  Shared bathroom
`roomfacility::109`  :  Lake view
`roomfacility::130`  :  Outdoor dining area
`roomfacility::159`  :  Pool with a view
`roomfacility::10`  :  Fax
`roomfacility::36 ` :  Video games
`roomfacility::42`  :  Shared toilet
`roomfacility::103`  :  Game console
`roomfacility::110 ` :  Garden view
`roomfacility::143`  :  Board games/puzzles
`roomfacility::157`  :  Rooftop pool
`roomfacility::163`  :  Pool towels
`roomfacility::100`  :  Bidet
`roomfacility::127 ` :  High chair
`roomfacility::18`  :  Suit press
`roomfacility::129 ` :  Outdoor furniture
`roomfacility::133`  :  Upper floors accessible by stairs only
`roomfacility::190 ` :  Inner courtyard view
`roomfacility::87`  :  Executive lounge access
`roomfacility::96`  :  Oven
`roomfacility::122`  :  River view
`roomfacility::80`  :  Tile/Marble floor
`roomfacility::191`  :  Quiet street view
`roomfacility::215`  :  Air purifiers

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **room_facilities** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Room Facilities'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: fun_things_to_do
optional_parameters.description:
Fun Things To Do
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: popular_activities::11,  popular_activities::253

`popular_activities::11`  :  Fitness center
`popular_activities::253`  :  Fitness
`popular_activities::447`  :  Bicycle rental
`popular_activities::55`  :  Massage
`popular_activities::10`  :  Sauna
`popular_activities::76`  :  Cycling
`popular_activities::302`  :  Beach
`popular_activities::70`  :  Hiking
`popular_activities::12`  :  Golf course
`popular_activities::82`  :  Diving
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **fun_things_to_do** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Fun Things To Do'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: cancellation_policy
optional_parameters.description:
Cancellation Policy
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: fc::2, fc::5

`fc::2`  :  Free cancellation
`fc::5`  :  No prepayment
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **cancellation_policy** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Cancellation Policy'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: meals
optional_parameters.description:
Meals
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: mealplan::999,  mealplan::1

`mealplan::999`  :  Kitchen facilities
`mealplan::1`  :  Breakfast Included
`mealplan::4`  :  All-inclusive
`mealplan::8`  :  Breakfast & lunch included
`mealplan::9`  :  Breakfast & dinner included

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **meals** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Meals'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: property_rating
optional_parameters.description:
Property rating
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: class::3, class::4

`class::1`  :  1 stars
`class::2`  :  2 stars
`class::3`  :  3 stars
`class::4 ` :  4 stars
`class::5`  :  5 stars
`class::0`  :  Unrated
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **property_rating** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Property rating'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: property_type
optional_parameters.description:
Property type
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: ht_id::201, ht_id::204

`privacy_type::3 ` :  Entire homes & apartments
`family_friendly_property::1`  :  Family-Friendly Properties
`ht_id::201`  :  Apartments
`ht_id::204`  :  Hotels
`ht_id::203`  :  Hostels
`ht_id::215`  :  Boats
`ht_id::212`  :  Resort Villages
`ht_id::220`  :  Vacation Homes
`ht_id::221`  :  Lodges
`ht_id::220`  :  Vacation Homes
`ht_id::208`  :  Bed and Breakfast
`ht_id::216`  :  Guesthouses
`ht_id::222`  :  Homestays
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **property_type** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Property Type'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: filter_other
optional_parameters.description:
You can enter any filter values you want and can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
**Neighborhood**
`di::2285`   :   Berlin City Center
OR
**Landmarks**
`popular_nearby_landmarks::1537`   :   The Brandenburg Gate

etc.
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them.
You can check the filter values of the **filter_other** in the API at **filter** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: language_code
optional_parameters.description: The `language_code` value is obtained from the `code` field of the 【languages】 API.

optional_parameters.name: bed_preference
optional_parameters.description:
Bed Preference
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: tdb::2, tdb::3

`tdb::2`  :  Twin beds
`tdb::3 ` :  Double bed
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **bed_preference** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Bed Preference'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: distance_from
optional_parameters.description:
Distance from
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: distance::1000, distance::3000

`distance::1000`  :  Less than 1 km
`distance::3000`  :  Less than 3 km
`distance::5000`  :  Less than 5 km
※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **distance_from** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Distance from'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: review_score
optional_parameters.description:
Review Score
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 
Ex: review_score::90,  review_score::80

`review_score::90`  :  Wonderful: 9+
`review_score::80 ` :  Very Good: 8+
`review_score::70`  :  Good: 7+
`review_score::60`  :  Pleasant: 6+

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **review_score** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Review Score'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: sustainability
optional_parameters.description:
Sustainability
You can enter multiple values separated by commas. 

`SustainablePropertyFilter::1 ` :  Travel Sustainable properties

※ These values may vary depending on where the user enters them. 
You can check the filter values of the **sustainability** in the API at **filter**⇒**title:'Sustainability'** ​to see the available options.

optional_parameters.name: rooms
optional_parameters.description: Default: 1

optional_parameters.name: children_age
optional_parameters.description:
**children_age** must be numbers separated by commas.
Ex: 5,7

optional_parameters.name: adults
optional_parameters.description: Default: 2

optional_parameters.name: children
optional_parameters.description: Default: 0

optional_parameters.name: currency_code
optional_parameters.description: The `currency_code` value is obtained from the `code` field of the 【currencies】 API.
